question: Do you have a documented cloud backup strategy with defined backup frequencies?
Are your backups automated and scheduled regularly?
Have you defined Recovery Time Objectives (RTO) for critical systems?
Have you established Recovery Point Objectives (RPO) for data loss tolerance?
Are your cloud backup storage locations secured with encryption?
Do you regularly test your disaster recovery procedures and backup restoration?
Do you have a business continuity plan that includes backup and recovery procedures?
Have you established backup retention policies for different data types?
Do you use multi-region or geo-redundant backup storage?
Do you validate backup integrity and maintain backup logs?
